pageContext.course_type_long_description: Prepare for a full-day LEGO® camp packed with hands-on and minds-on STEM fun! Build projects inspired by cool machines such as: chugging Steamboats, enchanting Moon Bridges, and bustling Airports. Then construct the Ewok Village on Endor, fly through space on our X-Wings, and defend the Echo Base on Hoth. Learn about BOTH kinds of The Force in this new full-day themed engineering camp for LEGO® fanatics!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM + Jedi w/ LEGO® Materials: FULL DAY
pageContext.action_url_comment: Registration for Summer Camps begins February 7, 2019. Register by May 10 for summer camps and SAVE $8! See the registration page for details.
